Reference

Motif import

read_cisbp()

Import CIS-BP motifs.

read_homer()

Import HOMER motifs.

read_jaspar()

Import JASPAR motifs.

read_matrix()

Import motifs from raw matrices.

read_meme()

Import MEME motifs.

read_motifs()

Import universalmotif formatted motifs.

read_transfac()

Import TRANSFAC motifs.

read_uniprobe()

Import UNIPROBE motifs.

Motif export

write_homer()

Export motifs in HOMER format.

write_jaspar()

Export motifs in JASPAR format.

write_matrix()

Export motifs as raw matrices.

write_meme()

Export motifs in MEME format.

write_motifs()

Export motifs in universalmotif format.

write_transfac()

Export motifs in TRANSFAC format.

Motif creation and manipulation

add_multifreq()

Add multi-letter information to a motif.

convert_motifs()

Convert motif class.

convert_type()

Convert universalmotif type.

filter_motifs()

Filter a list of motifs.

merge_motifs()

Merge motifs.

motif_rc()

Get the reverse complement of a motif.

sample_sites()

Generate binding sites from a motif.

shuffle_motifs()

Shuffle motifs by column.

switch_alph()

Switch between DNA and RNA alphabets.

trim_motifs()

Trim motifs.

`[`(<universalmotif>) `[<-`(<universalmotif>) initialize(<universalmotif>) show(<universalmotif>) as.data.frame(<universalmotif>) subset(<universalmotif>) normalize(<universalmotif>) rowMeans(<universalmotif>) colMeans(<universalmotif>) colSums(<universalmotif>) rowSums(<universalmotif>) nrow(<universalmotif>) ncol(<universalmotif>) colnames(<universalmotif>) rownames(<universalmotif>) cbind(<universalmotif>)

universalmotif: Motif class.

view_motifs()

Plot motif logos.

Sequence creation and manipulation

create_sequences()

Create random sequences.

shuffle_sequences()

Shuffle input sequences.

Motif analysis

compare_motifs()

Compare motifs.

enrich_motifs()

Enrich for input motifs in a set of sequences.

motif_pvalue()

Motif P-value and scoring utility

motif_tree()

Generate ggplot2 motif trees with ggtree.

run_meme()

Run MEME from within R.

scan_sequences()

Scan sequences for matches to input motifs.

Miscellaneous utilities

make_DBscores() ppm_to_icm() icm_to_ppm() pcm_to_ppm() ppm_to_pcm() ppm_to_pwm() pwm_to_ppm() position_icscore() get_consensus() consensus_to_ppm() consensus_to_ppmAA() get_consensusAA() summarise_motifs()

Utility functions.

Data

ArabidopsisMotif

Arabidopsis motif.

ArabidopsisPromoters

Arabidopsis promoters.

JASPAR2018_CORE_DBSCORES

JASPAR2018 CORE database scores.

JASPAR2018_CORE_DBSCORES_NORM

JASPAR2018 CORE databse scores (normalised).
